column4: Oh, I think it is. launchd is on OS X / some unix. Anyways, ifconfig still shows the Mask:192.0.0
sorta, init.d is the dir that contains the scripts to run at boot, so it's more like /Library/LaunchDaemons than launchd
init is sort of the launchd of linux, doesn't work anything like launchd really but serves the same sort of function
